title: Sipologie Roma Moka Pot 3-Cup Espresso Maker, For Classic Italian Coffee Brewing and Great Flavoured Strong Espresso, Premium Grade Aluminium Coffee Percolator 180ml, Silver
description:
CLASSIC ESPRESSO: Classic Italian Espresso at Home within minutes with Sipologie Moka Pot Coffee Maker. Use it to make espresso, lattes, cappuccinos, Cuban coffee, Italian mochas, crema, and more. Perfect for small households or solo coffee drinkers.
COFFEE DECOCTION MAKER: Brew amazing coffee decoction with Sipologie stovetop coffee percolator conveniently at your home. Makes 180 ml of Mocha coffee – enough for 3 demitasse/ espresso cups in just one go.
EASY TO USE: Simply fill the bottom chamber with water, add your finely ground coffee to the filter basket, and place it on your stovetop. The coffee will be ready in just a few minutes, giving you the perfect shot of espresso every time. It is also easy to clean by rinsing all parts in warm water before reassembling.
PREMIUM QUALITY: This elegantly designed striking red coloured coffee maker will look great on your table and kitchen. Highly durable Premium grade Aluminium Stovetop Espresso Maker with a temperature-resistant knob on the flip-top lid and V-spout allows for easy and safe pouring of coffee. The copper safety-release valve controls water pressure and delivery for perfectly extracted espresso, every time.
ESPRESSO SIZE: Please note that when the description refers to the number of cups, it is referring to Espresso/Demitasse cups, which typically hold around 30-40ml. Therefore, 3 Italian cups of Moka Pot coffee are equivalent to a full mug (approximately 150ml), rather than 3 regular-sized coffee cups. It is important to keep in mind that this measurement is generally consistent for all Moka Pots.
LONGEVITY ASSURED: Made from tough and enduring aluminium, our Moka pot is built to endure daily use and deliver aromatic espresso for countless brewing cycles.
1-YEAR WARRANTY: Crafted with meticulous attention to detail and using premium materials, our drinkware guarantees exceptional quality and longevity. Relax and enjoy your beverages without worry, as our warranty covers any manufacturing defects or issues that may arise during the first year of your purchase. With Sipologie, you can trust in our commitment to providing outstanding products that will enhance your drinking experience while offering the peace of mind you deserve.

title: CAFEC Abaca Cone-Shaped Coffee Paper Filter, Size 1, White, Pack of 100 | Use for V60, Flower Dripper, Pour Over | 100% Environmentally Friendly | Disposable Paper Coffee Filters (AC1-100W)
description:
Specialty Coffee Paper Filters for Specialty Coffee! This is not just paper, it is speciality paper filters for a cup of speciality coffee: Filter paper made of REFINED PULP (White version): The more commonly seen brewer filters are refined to remove the brown colour. It keeps the original flavour of the coffee grounds and makes a very robust pour-over drip coffee. NO USED PULP, DYES OR CHEMICALS ARE EVER USED IN THESE PAPER FILTERS. Completely biodegradable.
FSC Certified: The FSC certificate shows that the banana-tree fibre to make the paper is only sourced from well-managed, eco-friendly forests. 100% sustainable: No wood is used in the papermaking process: ABACA: Manilla Hemp, is extracted from the leaf stems of a certain species of banana tree, leaving the wood and tree completely intact.
Papermaking process: Dewatering: Dewater pulp and make a paper sheet. Drying: Dry the paper sheet by heating. Rolling: Roll the paper sheet under finely tuned and adjusted rolling pressure. No bleach, glues, chemicals or unnatural elements are added to the pulp. This is simply a 100% clean, eco-friendly, forest-sustainable paper filter. Period. You will not be disappointed by the strength and suppleness of these highly crafted filters.
They will certainly stand out above the rest and make you the perfect cup of joe in the morning - every single time! If you love coffee and if making coffee is a labour of love, these filters - will enhance the quality of your morning coffee making routine!
They are elegant, supple and strong. They make the cleanest, most consistent coffee. They are made of superior eco-friendly certified materials. Clean-up is a cinch... When done, simply discard the filter with used grounds inside.

title: Sidapur Brass Dabara Set - Plain Brushed Matte Finish - For South Indian Filter Coffee - 120ml
description:
Century-old coffee drinking style - A long-lasting relationship with filter coffee, the dabara set dates back to the mid 19th century. Ever since then, it’s been the traditional way of enjoying the South Indian Filter Coffee or Filter Kaapi as it is lovingly called in the South of India. Even to this day, in most South Indian restaurants and homes, the dabara set is the favourite medium to serve hot coffee.
Perfectly finished - Sidapur endeavours to bring back the age-old coffee drinking experience to life with the traditional brass dabara set. Brushed matt, with a luxurious and elegant finish, you can take pride in presenting your Filter Kaapi in these to your house guests. As brass oxidises over time and forms patches (which is natural), we recommend that you periodically polish the Dabaras with a brass or appropriate metal polish to maintain its beauty.
Premium coffee experience - Dabara sets are still used in most households in the South Indian region. They are a cultural symbol of enjoying traditional Filter Kaapi. Just as a wine glass enhances the flavour and aroma of a fine wine, enjoy your South Indian Filter Coffee in a traditional Dabara for that authentic and best experience.
Proudly made in India - Bringing to the forefront that all our coffees are produced and packed completely in India, these matt finished brass dabara sets are also a part of our traditional culture that we proudly make in India.
The healthy way - This traditional dabara set is completely made from lead free, heavy duty sterling brass. Each set is of top-quality weighing 200g per set.
ai_description: Experience the century-old coffee tradition with our brass dabara set for a premium South Indian Filter Coffee experience. Proudly made in India.
